name: LaView LV-KDV1404B6BP-500GB 960H 4-Channel DVR with 500GB HDD and Four 600TVL Cameras

reviews.name: LaView LV-KDV1404B6BP-500GB 960H 4-Channel DVR with 500GB HDD and Four 600TVL Cameras
reviews.reviewText: I like the dvr unit because it has a user friendly operating system with a mouse, easy to setup.
reviews.title: This is a neat little unit. Cameras work very well

reviews.name: LaView LV-KDV1404B6BP-500GB 960H 4-Channel DVR with 500GB HDD and Four 600TVL Cameras
reviews.reviewText: Clear video to about 30 ft. day or night. Who can ask for any more for the price $245.
reviews.title: Good product so far.

reviews.name: LaView LV-KDV1404B6BP-500GB 960H 4-Channel DVR with 500GB HDD and Four 600TVL Cameras
reviews.reviewText: This system was easy to install as well as easy to use via the browser that is installed in the DVR. Be sure to review where you want your cameras.....I really needed 6 cameras to cover my home,s exterior. Plus, the 60 ft cable was a little short for one of my placements. Overall, I am satisfied-
reviews.title: easy setup

reviews.name: LaView LV-KDV1404B6BP-500GB 960H 4-Channel DVR with 500GB HDD and Four 600TVL Cameras
reviews.reviewText: Definition is quite good (not full HD), a bit hard to recognize faces if moving. The router and Internet set up can get tricky, depending on your router, the app won't give you control of the alarms, e-mail options, etc. for that you need to connect through a Windows computer in the same router. For the price it is a good buy.
reviews.title: A bit tough to setup through routers but all OK

reviews.name: LaView LV-KDV1404B6BP-500GB 960H 4-Channel DVR with 500GB HDD and Four 600TVL Cameras
reviews.reviewText: I'm pleased with the view I can get while I'm in my house. The cameras are clear. The cables are only 60 ft. I had to spend more money to buy longer cables. Getting the system up and running required a phone call to tech support. The mobile app for viewing away from my house worked 1 day. That required a phone call to tech support. Now it doesn't work . I'll have to call my cable provider. You need to have a lot of knowledge in computers to get the mobile app running. I'm happy I can view the cameras at my house but it isn't what I wanted. Remote viewing not so remote.
reviews.title: Not easy
